mapper.select: select b.*, nvl(a.cnt,0) as reply_cnt from ( select board_seq, count(*) as cnt from tbl_board_reply where board_type = 3 group by board_seq ) a right outer join ( select a.*, nvl(b.cnt, 0) as recommand_cnt from tbl_picture_board a left outer join ( select board_seq, count(*) as cnt from tbl_board_recommand where board_type = 3 group by board_seq ) b on a.picture_seq = b.board_seq ) b on a.board_seq = b.picture_seq
select * from (select * from tbl_picture_board where picture_seq = #{seq} ), ( select count(*) as recommand_cnt from tbl_board_recommand where board_type = '3' and board_seq = #{seq} )

select a.*, nvl(b.cnt, 0) as recommand_cnt from tbl_picture_board a left outer join ( select board_seq, count(*) as cnt from tbl_board_recommand where board_type = '3' group by board_seq ) b on a.picture_seq = b.board_seq where picture_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_picture_board ( picture_seq, division, subject, content, writer, base64_code ) values ( picture_seq.nextval, #{division}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{base64_code} )
mapper.update: update tbl_picture_board set division = #{division}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where picture_seq = #{seq}
